doc.title: Gachlilyot
doc.plot: Fireflies is a story that waited to be told for over twenty years. The movie is comprised of three quests in three different time periods. Gili Meisler searched for his brother Giora, Yom Kippur War MIA, twice in the past. First with his family, during the war, and ten years later in the Far East, on a personal inner journey. Now Gili departs on a third journey to heal from the past traumatic quests.
